page.title: 07The Longshaw Estate
page.content: The dog is then instructed via a series of familiar calls and whistles from his master to follow the set course until the sheep are finally penned. Points are awarded for each manoeuvre and a time limit is imposed depending upon whether the Trial is a single or double dog class. On the Thursday, the hound trail provided the spectacular sight of dogs chasing rags dipped in Aniseed and Paraffin across the moors. Also, a dog parade for best Bitch and Dog was sponsored by the Sheffield Telegraph and Star, an event which has no doubt improved the appearance of the competitive dogs. Highlights on Saturday were the Local and Novice classes but the trials provide an entertaining day out for all age groups.
